start: Welcome to the murder mystery value updates bot! It will send any updates in values based on mm2values.com website in a span of minutes! To get updated every time a change happens type /subscribe command
subscribe: You were successfully added to list of subscribers. To unsubscribe simply type /unsubscribe
unsubscribe: You were successfully removed from list of subscribers
help:
/start - introduction to bot
/subscribe - subscribe to the updates
/unsubscribe - unsubscribe from the updates
/log - get the last update
/status - check if you are subscribed
/help - check every command's description
